QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_objectmappings.id odf_pk, int_objectmappings.code as code, int_objectmappings.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, im_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, im_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, int_objectmappings.im_id as im_id, int_objectmappings.external_object_id as external_object_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, im_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, int_objectmappings.external_object as external_object, int_objectmappings.name as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_objectmappings.clarity_object as clarity_object, INT_OBJECTMAPPINGS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_int_object_mappings.partition_code as partition_code, INT_OBJECTMAPPINGS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_objectmappings.clarity_object_id as clarity_object_id, int_objectmappings.direction as direction, im_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_objectmappings int_objectmappings, int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_int_object_mappings odf_ca_int_object_mappings, (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_integrationmappings.id odf_pk, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_integration_mappings.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from int_integrationmappings int_integrationmappings, odf_ca_integration_mappings odf_ca_integration_mappings where 1 = 1 and int_integrationmappings.id = odf_ca_integration_mappings.id) im_id where 1 = 1 and int_objectmappings.im_id = int_integrationmappings.id and int_objectmappings.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_objectmappings.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and int_objectmappings.id = odf_ca_int_object_mappings.id and int_objectmappings.im_id = im_id.odf_pk
